headline.main: Flash Stakes Headlines Program For Opening of Saratoga Racing; Wheatley Stable's Laugh Likely Favorite in 80th Running of Sprint at Spa -- Bunny Babe, Brookville Entered

results.snippet: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 1 -- The Saratoga Association for the Improvement of the Breed of Horses will open its eighty-sixth mid-summer race meet here on the morrow.

byline.original: By JAMES ROACHSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 1 -- The Saratoga Association for the Improvement of the Breed of Horses will open its eighty-sixth mid-summer race meet here on the morrow.

headline.main: Laugh Beats Bunny's Babe in Flash Stakes at Saratoga Opening; WHEATLEY RACER SCORES AT 9 TO 5

results.snippet: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 2 -- For the Saratoga Association, which dates back to 1864, and for Sunny Jim Fitzsimmons, who dates back to '74, this was a fine day of horse-racing at a spot where racing has an extra-special charm.
results.lead_paragraph: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 2 -- For the Saratoga Association, which dates back to 1864, and for Sunny Jim Fitzsimmons, who dates back to '74, this was a fine day of horse-racing at a spot where racing has an extra-special charm.

headline.main: OUTSIDER SCORES IN SARATOGA DASH; Returning $61.70, Two Stars Outraces Misty in Stake for 2-Year-Old Fillies

results.snippet: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 9 -- Every admiral on the premises had a bet on the 2-year-old filly Two Stars in the $13,775 Schuylerville Stakes at Saratoga today. She won easily. Not much was wagered on her. She was the eighth choice in a ten...

byline.original: By JAMES ROACHSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 9 -- Every admiral on the premises had a bet on the 2-year-old filly Two Stars in the $13,775 Schuylerville Stakes at Saratoga today. She won easily. Not much was wagered on her. She was the eighth choice in a ten betting-unit line-up, and she paid $61.70 for each $2.

headline.main: Escargot Injured and Destroyed; Native Dancer Out of Whitney Handicap; KING COMMANDER WINS BEVERWYCK 5-to-1 Score for Expletive -- Vanderbilt Star's Next Start in Saratoga Cup

results.snippet: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 19 -- The competition -- and the fun -- went out of the beverwyck Steeplechase today when Mrs. Clara Elizabeth Adams' Escargot suffered a crippling injury. The winner of seven straight races made a three- legged...

byline.original: By JAMES ROACHSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N. Y., Aug. 19 -- The competition -- and the fun -- went out of the beverwyck Steeplechase today when Mrs. Clara Elizabeth Adams' Escargot suffered a crippling injury. The winner of seven straight races made a three- legged clearance of the water jump in front of the stands and then was taken off the course in a horse ambulance and destroyed.
